short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes sponsored / promoted social ads content on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We're all the product and the user on these social platforms, so this chrome extension aims to dynamically remove all "sponsored" / "promoted" posts / ads from Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Reddit. Let's take some power back.
